main event: An observer saw a star-like object in the sky that moved left and right, appearing much brighter than a normal star, and then disappeared behind some trees.
interesting points: The object was observed for 4-5 minutes,The sighting coincided with a reported UFO incident in the area on October 8, 1966,The object was described as radiant and capable of controlled maneuvers,The observer detailed the object changing size and brightness,The report emphasized that essential data was lacking for a proper evaluation.
witness description: An individual who reported seeing the object while walking on the street.
